item.name: Verify Create Cluster with Blank Node Values
item.description: Verify Create Cluster with Blank Node Values

exec: tests["Code is 'Bad Request'"] = errorCode == "Bad Request" === true;

tests ["Verify error message is 'Blank nodetype name is not allowed.  Blank nodedurabilityLevel value is not allowed.  Blank InstanceCount value is not allowed.  Blank Size is not allowed.  Blank Scalein value is not allowed.  Blank ScaleOut value is not allowed.  Blank MaxNode value is not allowed.  Blank MinNode value is not allowed.  Blank IsPrimaryNode value is not allowed.  Blank subnetName value is not allowed.  Blank subnetPrefix value is not allowed.  Blank placement value is not allowed.  Blank LBType value is not allowed. Please enter a valid subnet prefix. Node name should be between 1-9 characters only.InstanceCount should be between 3-50 only. Scalein value should be between 1-100 only. ScaleOut value should be between 1-100 only. MinNode value should be between 1-50 only.Load Balancer Type should be internal or public.Node Durability Level should be bronze, silver, gold or platinum only at node 1. Primary node should be true or false only. For Silver reliability level, MinNode value should be 5 or greater at node 1. There should be only one primary node.For dev cluster node lbtype should be public only. For dev cluster node durability level should be bronze only at node 1.'"] = errorMessage == "Blank nodetype name is not allowed.  Blank nodedurabilityLevel value is not allowed.  Blank InstanceCount value is not allowed.  Blank Size is not allowed.  Blank Scalein value is not allowed.  Blank ScaleOut value is not allowed.  Blank MaxNode value is not allowed.  Blank MinNode value is not allowed.  Blank IsPrimaryNode value is not allowed.  Blank subnetName value is not allowed.  Blank subnetPrefix value is not allowed.  Blank placement value is not allowed.  Blank LBType value is not allowed. Please enter a valid subnet prefix. Node name should be between 1-9 characters only.InstanceCount should be between 3-50 only. Scalein value should be between 1-100 only. ScaleOut value should be between 1-100 only. MinNode value should be between 1-50 only.Load Balancer Type should be internal or public.Node Durability Level should be bronze, silver, gold or platinum only at node 1. Primary node should be true or false only. For Silver reliability level, MinNode value should be 5 or greater at node 1. There should be only one primary node.For dev cluster node lbtype should be public only. For dev cluster node durability level should be bronze only at node 1. " === true;

item.name: Verify Create Cluster with Blank Certificate Details
item.description: Verify Create Cluster with Blank Certificate Details

exec: tests["Code is 'Bad Request'"] = errorCode == "Bad Request" === true;

tests ["Verify error message is ' Blank certificateThumbprint value is not allowed.  Blank sourceVaultvalue is not allowed.  Blank certificateUrlvalue is not allowed.  Blank sfReverseProxyCertificateUrl value is not allowed.  Blank sfReverseProxyCertificateThumbprint value is not allowed.  Blank sslCertificateUrl value is not allowed.  Blank sslCertificateThumbprint value is not allowed. Source vault value should always start with '/subscriptions/'Certificate URL value should always start with 'https://'Reverse Proxy Certificate URL value should always start with 'https://''"] = errorMessage == " Blank certificateThumbprint value is not allowed.  Blank sourceVaultvalue is not allowed.  Blank certificateUrlvalue is not allowed.  Blank sfReverseProxyCertificateUrl value is not allowed.  Blank sfReverseProxyCertificateThumbprint value is not allowed.  Blank sslCertificateUrl value is not allowed.  Blank sslCertificateThumbprint value is not allowed. Source vault value should always start with '/subscriptions/'Certificate URL value should always start with 'https://'Reverse Proxy Certificate URL value should always start with 'https://'" === true;

item.name: Add Ports

exec: tests ["Port added successfully"] = message == "Port "+ AddPorts +" added successfully on LB "+lbname + " , Please wait for 5 minutes changes to take effect" === true;

exec: tests ["Failed to add port, as PORT already exist"] = message == "Failed to add port as "+ AddPorts +" already exist" === true;

item.description: Removing the ports

exec: tests ["PORT removed successfully"] = message == "Port "+ RemovePorts + " removed successfully from "+lbname + ", Please wait for 5 minutes changes to take effect" === true;
